name: Shadow Reaper
speciality: Masters shadows to cloak and deceive enemies.

name: Blaze Fury
speciality: Breathes fire hotter than lava and can withstand extreme heat.

name: Icy Phantom
speciality: Controls icy winds and can freeze opponents in their tracks.

name: Thunderstrike
speciality: Generates powerful thunderstorms and electric shocks.

name: Venom Viper
speciality: Releases toxic venom that can paralyze foes instantly.

name: Earthshaker
speciality: Creates earthquakes with a single stomp and manipulates rocks.

name: Mystic Mirage
speciality: Illusionist who can create mirages to confuse and mislead enemies.

name: Soulmender
speciality: Heals allies by channeling rejuvenating energy, restoring health over time.
